events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a full refund as soon as possible because I am very disappointed with the order.
The reported issue involving a request for money back is classified under the Refund cluster for proper handling.
Assigning the case to our refund processing team to ensure the customer’s request is addressed promptly and accurately.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the problem quickly?
The order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product delivered. Please expedite the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the refund soon. Thank you for the assistance.
The refund process has been successfully initiated and you should see the amount credited shortly.
We wanted to check if you have received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and timely support!
Closing the case as the refund was successfully processed and the customer has confirmed receipt.
Sending a satisfaction survey to gather feedback on your recent customer service experience.
